adviseScripts.text: The great survivors of the olden days,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: they always had a cameraman following them around.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: They would be chased by the bears together, run from avalanches together,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: eat roasted cockroaches together, jump off cliffs together...
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: When will I ever be able to find a cameraman like that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: How about you do it yourself?
I can do it when I retire.
Well, there are some pretty high-end selfie sticks these days.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: ... No, that wouldn't be right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: You can't experience the passionate bonds that are formed from facing extreme conditions together by yourself!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Come on. That's too far in the future. Can't you just do it now?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: It's fine if you just think of it as part-time...
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Sorry, I'm just really focused on survival right now.
Hmph.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I discuss extreme careers in the olden days with Tove.
You've been going through a rough patch, haven't you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: That's why I brought you some nourishment.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Tove takes two bags out of her pocket.
I'll eat one and give one to you. Now, pick one!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Pick the bag that is wriggling.
Pick the bag that is tinged with a faint touch of red.
Oh, you chose a high-protein diet!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: These are beetles. They are a species that only lives in the north.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: The texture is very nice. Hehe. But putting it in your mouth is the hardest part.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Haha. You chose the liver of an Elk!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: It's not only high in protein but also rich in iron and vitamins.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: If you can endure the bitterness, it is a great nourishing meal.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: ... But why are you making that face?
It's nothing. Haha.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I just get so excited that I get to keep the other one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I have an enjoyable and bizarre mealtime with Tove.
I've been focusing on inventing a new survival tool recently.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: If it's possible I'm hoping it would help make up for my squadmates' weak points.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Do you have any good ideas?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: A pillow that guarantees a good night's sleep anywhere.
A magical shield that prevents any machine malfunctions.
For Neve?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: This pillow can use leather to make, with soft moss or leaves to fill,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: and it would be good to make it resemble you as closely as possible.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: To do that, I'll need you to accompany me as a reference! Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Something like gloves that could prevent electronic devices from being destroyed? Ludmilla would probably like that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: But I don't think it exists in reality.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: ... Should I look into myths?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Tove about methods to make unconventional tools.
Earlier, Ludmilla invited me to have tea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: She asked me to bring tea leaves of my choice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: So I gathered some, which do you think I should take?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Some unknown plant roots.
A branch of pine needles.
This one, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: They are dandelion roots so I can say it's a flower tea. Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Well, pine needle tea is said to boost your immune system.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Then, I'll just pluck some needles from the branch...
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: *Plop*
A caterpillar drops from the branch.
Eeeek!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: T-today must be my lucky day! A high-protein meal just fell from the sky!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Didn't you just say eeeek?
I prepare for an exciting tea time with Tove.
One time, there was a sudden gust of wind during one of my missions,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: so I went to a nearby ice cave to take shelter.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: But, someone was already inside!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Don't tell me it was... Neve?
Don't tell me it was... a bear?
Oh, if it was then I wouldn't be here right now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Neve is usually friendly but if you bother her when she's sleeping...
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: She'd probably tear you to shreds.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: So I gently walked backwards while avoiding eye contact.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: *Sigh* I still get goosebumps thinking about it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Tove and I share our experiences of encountering wild animals during our missions.
You know how Ludmilla
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: breaks all machines she touches?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Don't you think we can use that against the Raptures?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Why didn't we think of that before?
It's hard to get that close to them.
You think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I'll go tell Ludmilla right now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: ... That's true.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: It's impossible to get that close to a Rapture.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I just mentioned it because I thought it would be amazing if it was possible.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Tove and I let our imaginations run wild about Ludmilla's constitution.
I admire some survivalists from the olden days.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: What would you think if I tried making survival videos like them?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Are you confident you could perform eating bizarre foods in your videos?
I don't think there are any shows with a similar concept so I think it would work well.
Come on. I'm a survival expert. You think I'm not capable of that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Well, if it comes down to it, I can hold the camera and you can perform.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: After all, there is no such thing as nature in the Ark!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I should plan it out when I have some time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Tove and I watch extreme survival videos from the olden days.
I always study survival tactics really hard,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: but when I actually find myself in a survival situation, it doesn't go as smoothly as I imagined.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: You can just rely on me as you always have.
You just need to keep practicing.
Huh? I don't think I relied on you that much.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Of course there was that time I sought your help when I couldn't use the flint to start the fire or when a centipede popped out of nowhere!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: But those were unexpected situations!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... Still, they had to do with survival.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: If you make even a single mistake, there might not be another chance.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: But hearing you say that makes me feel at ease. Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Tove about the limits of studying survival only from books.
There is something I've been curious about for a while.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: How are you so good at eating unusual foods?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I learned from the master of the wild.
It's just lunch to me.
What? You mean there's another survival expert in this day and age?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Tove subtly grabs onto my sleeve.
Um... Perhaps can you put in a good word for me? Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: By that you mean you're born with it, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Darn! This unfair world!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Tove about the various edible insects.
I hugged Alice tightly yesterday.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Her body is warm which is an advantage for surviving in the cold.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Is there any way I can become more like Alice?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Try acting like a bunny.
You are fine just the way you are.
Tove makes a V sign with both hands and puts it on her head,
and with both feet together, starts hopping.
Like this?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: ... Sorry, just kidding.
Well... Even though I don't have a warm body like Alice,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I have the skills to make survival tools that can function like that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Thank you for recognition. Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I hear 10 adorable moments of Alice from Tove.
This just came to mind,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: but what do you think I would be doing if I wasn't a survival expert?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: A new generation rookie employee.
Firefighter.
Ah! I've seen that a lot on Tetra TV recently.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: You mean someone who wears noise-cancelling earphones while they work,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: and takes care of plants during work hours?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Wow, I'm shocked. I didn't know I gave off that kind of impression.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Huh? But...
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I prefer making fires to putting them out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Still, there is a connection since it's saving people's lives, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Tove about different occupations in another life.
Between a black mamba and I,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: if the two of us fought, who do you think would win?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: You, of course.
Black Mamba.
Ooh, you trust me that much? So much pressure...
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Did you know? A black mamba's venom is 70 times stronger than that of a rattlesnake.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: And its top speed for short distances is 20km per hour.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: ... But it doesn't mean that I'm not confident, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Wow, you're not holding back.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Of course it's better to run rather than face a dangerous venomous snake like a Black Mamba.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: But still... my pride as a survival expert is...
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I learn about the venomous snakes to avoid in the wild.
Survivalist, do you have a goal in life?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: My goal is all about survival. About continuing to live as long as I can.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Of course it's reclaiming the surface.
Survival is also my goal.
Wow... Of course yours is on a whole different scale compared to mine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: If you achieve your goal, it might make it easier for me to achieve mine. Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I can help you achieve it right now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: If we go a little further from the Northern Base, you can experience survival there. Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Tove and I compile a bucket list of 30 things in life.
The Unlimited is a squad that rescues people who are lost.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: But sometimes we can't save everyone.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I know it can't be helped but it still lingers in my heart... What should I do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: There is nothing that time can't resolve.
Instead of those you couldn’t rescue, you should think about the ones you did.
Hmm... I know you're right,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: but it's still so hard right now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I wish I had something to look forward to.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: You're right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Everything has both a bright and a dark side,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: and I decide which one to focus on! Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I have a serious conversation with Tove.
I heard that it has extreme conditions
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: in the Outer Rim.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Is there any special method of survival?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: To fight and steal?
It's about utilizing the resources that you have. No matter how scarce they are.
Applying that to my situation would mean
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: fighting against my squadmates for survival.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Yikes... I'd rather jump into freezing water without any gear on!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Basically it's not that different from the survival knowledge that I know.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: We might have more in common with the people there than I thought.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about Outer Rim with Tove.
Hey, Survivalist, can I ask you something?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: What does it feel like to like someone?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Why are you suddenly interested in that?
Like feeling you could survive any extreme situation with that person.
Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: To tell you the truth, the algorithm led me here. Haha.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: While I was looking for survival videos, a video about that automatically popped up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: So what's the answer?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Of course, physically I rely on my squadmates,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: but mentally you're the one I rely on the most.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Then does that mean I like you? Huhhh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I have a heart-beating conversation with Tove.
I wonder what the Unlimited members were like when they first started.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Somehow I get the feeling that they were amazing even then.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: They might have even been a super rookie like me? Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: To be honest, it's hard to imagine.
They might have been more sloppy than you think.
To be honest, me too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Especially Ludmilla... I thought she was perfect from the beginning.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... You're right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Even now, they still show a human side.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: For me, that side is more approachable and likable. Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I learn about how Tove has adapted to The Unlimited squad.
It seems that when you are in the Northern Base,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: you only accumulate experience surviving in the bitter cold.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Sometimes I would like to experience a new environment.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Then you can come to the Ark sometime.
What about going to the desert?
Uh? But there is no such thing as nature in the Ark.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Instead, there is still a jungle but in a different sense.
Ah... Do you mean the jungle of society?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: If it's not a real jungle, I don't think I'd have anything to do there.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Wow! A desert!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I know everything about avoiding the sun, staying hydrated,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: and even distinguishing edible spiders in the desert.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I never tried surviving in an environment like that. Do you want to go there with me in the future?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Tove about surviving in various regions.
What genre of music do you like?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: The sound of nature.
Noise.
Hehe, same here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Especially when I've created a warm shelter and snuggled inside,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I like the sound of rain.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Huh? That is not a genre.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: It's the name of a famous singer in the Ark!
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Sometimes a singer can create their own genre.
Tove and I listen to the music that we like.
Splendamin or bizarre survival food,
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: which one do you think is better suited as a punishment in a game?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Bizarre survival food.
Splendamin.
Hmm... you're right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Survival food includes things like spiders and animal eyeballs which usually people avoid.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: However, if you look closer, you can also find a lot of really delicious foods too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: I second that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Do you know that I can't eat any more Splendamin even though it's not been so long since I came to the surface?
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Of course I eat it when I have to, but there is a huge difference in freshness.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: Anyways, I'll take your opinions into account.
adviseScripts.speaker: Tove

adviseScripts.text: What?
I play a punishment game with Tove.
